thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 3 of 199
thread.title: Trudy

author: Trudy
title: Trudy
text: Today I received an offer in the mail to Post Jobs for Free with a code I was given. Don't fall for this! It's not FREE. It's just like ordering face cream free trial on line. They require a credit card "just to validate the business" but they'll charge that card in 4 days if you don't call them back to cancel. Don't fall for any ZipRecruiter offer to Post Jobs for FREE. It's not FREE.
